question.en-US: Can you tell me what object is directly ahead of me?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我我正前方是什么物体吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以話我我正前方係乜嘢物體啊？

question.en-US: Can you tell me what item is on my left side?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我我左边的是什么项目吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以話我我左邊嘅係乜嘢項目啊？

question.en-US: What is the item located on my right side?
question.zh-CN: 我右边的物品是什么？
question.zh-HK: 我右邊嘅物品係乜嘢？

question.en-US: Can you tell me which item is the closest to me?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我哪个项目离我最近吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以話我邊個項目離我最近啊？

question.en-US: Which item is closest to the center of the frame?
question.zh-CN: 哪个项目最接近画面中心？
question.zh-HK: 邊個項目最接近畫面中心？

question.en-US: What object is directly in front of me?
question.zh-CN: 我的正前方是什么物体？
question.zh-HK: 乜嘢物體就喺我面前？

question.en-US: What object is positioned to my left?
question.zh-CN: 什么物体位于我的左边？
question.zh-HK: 乜嘢物體位於我嘅左邊？

question.en-US: Can you tell me what item is on my right side?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我我右边的是什么项目吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以話我我右邊嘅係乜嘢項目啊？

question.en-US: What item is the closest to me?
question.zh-CN: 离我最近的物体是什么？
question.zh-HK: 乜嘢物品離我最近？

question.en-US: What is the object closest to the center of the frame?
question.zh-CN: 离画面中心最近的物体是什么？
question.zh-HK: 離畫面中心最近嘅物體係乜嘢？

question.en-US: What is the item positioned directly in front of me?
question.zh-CN: 我正前方的物品是什么？
question.zh-HK: 我正前方的物品係乜嘢？

question.en-US: Can you identify the item on my left side?
question.zh-CN: 你能否识别我左边是什么物体？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以認出我左邊嘅物品啊？

question.zh-CN: 你能看到我右边是什么吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以睇到我右邊係乜嘢啊？
